instructions: These instructions are not used in any way other than to serve the user of this file.
The hierarchy of this JSON file will translate into the structure of the file system of your generated project (base setup).
Folders can feature recursion via an array of 'children'.
EJS tags can be used in this file as well. It will be processed prior to being loaded.
Folders can have the template property. This means everything enclosed will be processed with EJS.
Folders with a source will be copied in their entirety. If a children array is given, it will still be processed afterwards.
Files can be copied by passing a source path, relative to the generators/templates folder.
